001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004
005public class ApiVersion {
006
007    private final int major;
008    private final int minor;
009    public ApiVersion(int major, int minor) {
010        this.major = major;
011        this.minor = minor;
012    }
013
014    public int getMajor() {
015        return major;
016    }
017
018    public int getMinor() {
019        return minor;
020    }
021
022    public boolean greaterThan(ApiVersion other) {
023        return getMajor() > other.getMajor() || (getMajor() == other.getMajor() && getMinor() > other.getMinor());
024    }
025
026    public boolean greaterThan(KnownApiVersion other) {
027        return greaterThan(other.get());
028    }
029
030    public String toString() {
031        return "ApiVersion(major=" + major + ", minor=" + minor + ")";
032    }
033
034    public String serialize() {
035        return major + "," + minor;
036    }
037
038    public static ApiVersion deserialize(String s) {
039        if (s == null || s.isEmpty()) return null;
040        String[] parts = s.split(",");
041        Validate.isTrue(parts.length == 2);
042        return new ApiVersion(Integer.parseInt(parts[0]), Integer.parseInt(parts[1]));
043    }
044}
